class_notes: This class meets in person MW with additional online, asynchronous meetings on Fridays.
course_description: Prerequisite: Russian 102, 110, or consent of instructor. Focus on more advanced grammatical and syntactical constructions both in written and spoken Russian. Supplemented by multimedia exercises and materials.
schedule_location:
MW 11:30am-12:45pm in Callaway Center S103
F 11:30am-12:20pm in ONLINE
